imagingbook.common.filter.generic.GenericFilterScalar

    Package Description
    imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving

    • Uses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving

      Subclasses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BilateralFilterScalar
      Scalar (non-separable) version of the Bilateral filter as proposed in [1].
      class  KuwaharaFilterScalar
      Scalar version of a Kuwahara-type filter, similar to the filter described in [1].
      class  NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar
      Scalar version of the Nagao-Matsuyama filter.
      class  PeronaMalikFilterScalar
      Scalar version of the Perona-Malik filter, without gradient array.

    • Uses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.examples

      Subclasses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.examples 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ExampleFilter3x3Scalar
      Example filter based on GenericFilterScalar performing linear convolution with a custom 3x3 filter kernel.

    • Uses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.linear

      Subclasses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.linear 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GaussianFilter
      This class implements a 2D Gaussian filter by extending LinearFilter.
      class  LinearFilter
      This class represents a 2D linear filter specified by an arbitrary 2D convolution kernel.

    • Uses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear

      Subclasses of GenericFilterScalar in imagingbook.common.filter.nonlinear 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ScalarMedianFilter
      Ordinary (scalar) median filter for color images implemented by extending the GenericFilter class.
